roleset.name: to shock or surprise

example.name: transitive
example.text: The decision to put the entire collection on the block stunned many , since Mr. Dorrance had served as chairman of the Philadelphia Museum of Art , and it had been assumed many of the works would be donated to the institution .

propbank.arg: The decision to put the entire collection on the block
since Mr. Dorrance had served as chairman of the Philadelphia Museum of Art , and it had been assumed many of the works would be donated to the institution

example.name: all arguments
example.text: In July , the company stunned Wall Street with the prediction that growth in the personal computer business overall would be only 10 % in 1990 , a modest increase when compared with the sizzling expansion of years past .

propbank.arg: with the prediction that growth in the personal computer business overall would be only 10 % in 1990 , a modest increase when compared with the sizzling expansion of years past

example.name: adjectival rel: stunned
example.text: I 'm still stunned because I figured AZ would be way more likely to go for Santorum a little strongly compared to MI .

propbank.arg: because I figured AZ would be way more likely to go for Santorum a little strongly compared to MI

roleset.note: STUN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'stun' based on WSJ; adjectival 'stunned' based on BOLT-2,3. (from stun.01-v)
STUNNING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from stunning.01-j)
STUNNED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from stunned.01-j)
